title: Image Upload & Preview
description:
Design an Image Upload & Preview component that allows users to select an image, instantly preview it, validate its size and type, and simulate an upload process.

Functional requirements:
- Let the user choose an image via file input (or optional drag-and-drop)
- Immediately show a thumbnail preview using URL.createObjectURL
- Validate file type (JPEG/PNG) before previewing
- Validate max file size (e.g. 2 MB)
- Display clear error feedback if validation fails
- Show a loading/skeleton state while simulating an upload (1–2 seconds)
- Allow replacing or removing the selected image
- Ensure preview maintains aspect ratio and doesn’t stretch

Non-functional:
- Must work smoothly on mobile (touch-friendly)
- Accessible: keyboard navigable, ARIA roles for errors, focus handling
- State transitions should feel natural (initial → preview → uploading → uploaded)
- Avoid memory leaks caused by stale object URLs
- Drag-and-drop UX should not break default file input accessibility

Data constraints:
- Only single-image upload is supported
- Max file size: ~2 MB
- Allowed MIME types: image/jpeg, image/png
- Upload is simulated; no real backend integration
